radiographic_examinations.findings: Plasma HIV-1 RNA levels before therapy began ranged from approximately 100,000 to several million copies/mL.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: After 6 months of STI-based treatment, there was a several-log-fold reduction in the plasma HIV-1 RNA level. After 14 months, these values remained less than pretreatment levels in 2 of the 3 children.

radiographic_examinations.findings: CD4 T lymphocyte counts were low before treatment.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: A sustained increase of 18 CD4+ T lymphocytes/mL per month was observed during the therapy.
